title: Amerant Bancorp Inc. Declares Dividend | AMTB Stock News
text:
- Amerant Bancorp Inc. (
AMTB,Financial) declares a cash dividend of $0.09 per share. - The dividend will be paid on May 30, 2025, to shareholders recorded by May 15, 2025.
- Amerant operates 20 banking centers in Florida.
Amerant Bancorp Inc. (AMTB) announced that its Board of Directors has declared a cash dividend of $0.09 per share of common stock. The dividend is scheduled for payment on May 30, 2025. Shareholders who are recorded at the close of business on May 15, 2025, will be eligible to receive the dividend.
Amerant Bancorp, headquartered in Coral Gables, Florida, has been a prominent player in the financial sector since 1979. Through its main subsidiary, Amerant Bank, N.A., and other subsidiaries, the company provides a range of services including deposits, credit, and wealth management. Currently, Amerant operates 19 banking centers in South Florida and one in Tampa, Florida.
As of the latest data, Amerant Bancorp (AMTB, Financial) has a market capitalization of $790.07 million, with a float of 33.36 million shares. Insider ownership stands at 15.87%, while institutional ownership is at 71.86%.
